time.Description: Time in relation to time zero defined by the _pet.json

plasma_radioactivity.Description: Blood activity was measured by the Twilite Two blood detector, converted to plasma concentration using the b2plasma function from the Turku PET Center library (tpcc), modeled as a sum of exponentials using the function fit_feng (tpcc), and the model was evaluated in the middle of the reconstructed PET time-frames using the function fit2dat (tpcc).
